    public class MessageUtil
extends org.apache.axis2.receivers.AbstractInOutMessageReceiver
    Axis2 service operation utilities and for routing calls to WebLogic and WebSphere servers.

    • Method Detail

      • getCredentials

        protected static java.util.Properties getCredentials(org.apache.axis2.context.MessageContext messageContextIn)
        Obtains the web service credentials for Axis2, which come from either the Axis2 services.xml deployment descriptor or Curam custom SOAP header (depending on build and/or descriptor settings; see the Curam documentation for more details). Override this method if you require alternate credential processing for all Curam receiver processing.
        Parameters:
        messageContextIn - Input MessageContext.
        Returns:
        properties object containing credentials.
